message.content:
I need to identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period from the financial statement.

Looking at the income statement, I can see the line item "Cost of Goods Sold" which represents the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period. 

From the income statement:
- "Cost of Goods Sold" is listed as 1,249,000.00

This is the value that represents the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '1249000.00'} }
```
